name: Houndour
flavorText:
It uses different
kinds of cries for
communicating with others of its kind
and for pursuing
its prey.

previous.name: Skarmory
previous.flavorText:
Its sturdy wings
look heavy, but
they are actually hollow and light,
allowing it to fly
freely in the sky.

next.name: Houndoom
next.flavorText:
If you are burned
by the flames it
shoots from its mouth, the pain
will never go
away.
